title: Home Network Security & Wi-Fi Hardening in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Protect your household from scams, spying, and insecure smart devices using tools and practices trusted by security professionals.
description: Secure your home network in {{city_upper}} with DNS filtering, Wi-Fi hardening, smart-device isolation, and privacy-first controls. Implemented with open, local-first tools.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Smart TVs, speakers, and voice assistants often collect behavioral data and phone it home, sometimes bypassing basic router controls.
Most home routers ship with weak settings, default passwords, and open ports that expose you to malware and tracking.
By default, many networks send DNS requests to providers that can log browsing activity, impacting privacy.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We apply practical controls based on NIST/CISA-aligned principles, tailored for residential environments. The goal: reduce digital risk, improve privacy, and keep you in control. Without subscriptions or vendor lock-in.
items: DNS filtering to block malware, tracking, and phishing domains
Wi-Fi hardening with strong encryption and restricted access
Guest and untrusted device networks isolated from your main devices
Custom firewall rules to block unwanted or unknown traffic
Segmentation/VLANs to contain vulnerable IoT devices
Local-first, open-source tooling. No cloud dashboards or spyware

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We start with a review of your layout, devices, and router defaults to identify weak points.
Then we implement the right mix of filtering, isolation, and configuration to improve security and privacy without adding complexity.
You stay informed and in control with clear documentation and no ongoing fees.
